text: Balbino Jaramillo (15 May 1951 - 7 May 2013) was a Colombian cyclist. He competed in the individual pursuit and points race events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Colombia Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Colombia Category:Cyclists at the 1975 Pan American Games
title: Balbino Jaramillo
